entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
